text: @realDonaldTrump Trump shut the whole us down. What are u guys waiting for until the whole USA catch the covid-19 this is getting worse day by day people are still going out. I had to quit my job cuz I’m scared to bring this virus home back to my child and my elderly mom SHUT IT DOWN?!
